testing.name: Developing a culture of Ukraine in the second half of XVII - the first half of the XVIII century.

question.text: In which cities Hetmanate Slobozhanshchina in the first half of the XVII century. acting colleges?

answer.text: Chernihiv, Kharkiv, Pereyaslav
Lviv, Odessa, Kiev

question.text: In which cities Left-bank Ukraine was the largest printing press?

answer.text: Kyiv and Chernihiv
Lviv and Lutsk

question.text: Which university in Ukraine was a major center of science and art during the second half of XVII - the first half of XVIII century.?

answer.text: Ostrog Academy
Kyiv-Mohyla Academy

question.text: Which city is called the musical capital of Ukraine Hetman Kyrylo Razumovsky times?
Which of architectural structures were built or rebuilt Hetman Ivan Mazepa in Ukrainian Cossack Baroque style?

answer.text: All Saints Church on the economic Gate of Kiev-Pechersk Lavra, St. Sophia and St. Michael's Cathedral in Kiev, the Assumption Cathedral and Trinity Gate Church of the Kiev-Pechersk Lavra
Cathedral in Mhar, St. George's Cathedral Vydubytsky Monastery in Kiev

question.text: Which attractions are architectural buildings in the style of Ukrainian Cossack Baroque?

answer.text: St. Basil's Cathedral in Kharkiv, Transfiguration Cathedral Mhar, House J. Lizogub (regimental office) in Chernihiv
Chapel Kampians in the Latin church in Lviv, Lviv House Kornyakta

question.text: Who is the most prominent artists of the then graphic artists, craftsmen Ukrainian Baroque?

answer.text: Alexander Tarasevych, Leonti Tarasevych John Schyrskyy
Lazarus Baranovych, Theophanes Prokopovych Michael Myklashevsky

question.text: What is the most famous artists of Ukrainian Baroque painters?

answer.text: Clement and John Zynoviy Velychkovsky
John Rutkovych and Job Kondzelevich

question.text: Which works written in the genre of historical fiction?

answer.text: "Synopsis" "Chronicle of the ancient chroniclers"
"Zehar of poluzeharkom", "key of knowledge" Lives of the Saints,

question.text: Who is the most famous artists of the Cossack chroniclers?

answer.text: Gregory Hrabianka and Samiylo Velichko
Lazarus and Daniel Baranovych Tuptalo

question.text: Who of artists is outstanding church leaders, writers?

answer.text: Michael Myklashevsky John Velychkovsky John Rutkovych
Stefan Jaworski, Lazarus Baranovych, Daniel Tuptalo
A prominent Ukrainian painter and engraver
Ukrainian scholar and lexicographer, public and church figure
